title: In-Game Chat box out of screen
body: My in-game chat box is out of my screen, I've tried other fixes but I can't find where some of the stuff is.... if anyone knows how to fix it'd be useful thanks.

replies.body:
Like, the box is completely missing, or it's mostly out of view? You can hit **ENTER** to bring up the box if you can't see it. It should pop up a bar to move it around if it's still somewhere on your screen. If this is the case, you can grab it and move it around, as shown in the screenshot below:

(Click to enlarge)
http://imgur.com/a/XlfKP

Let me know if this worked!
Wow! so simple must have accidently pulled it out of screen! Thanks for help fixed :DDDd
